directions.step:
Peel and core apples. Combine margarine,salt,sugar,lemon rind, and cinnamon. Roll pastry 1/8 inch thick and cut into squares large enough to cover apples. Place apples on pastry squares and fill each cavity of apple with sugar mixture. Bring corners of pastry together at top, moisten edges and pinch together to hold apple in place. Place in greased baking pan and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve with pudding sauce or cream. Serves 6.
Baking powder biscuit dough may be used instead of pastry.
